txt.en: Collected fine rich ore for smithing ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have made an ordinary ring (though considering the time constraints, it is rather a success)
You have made an ordinary ring
The master of the crows seems to believe himself to be a Wizard in the making and requests a Ring of Power to help him achieve his great ends.

'What qualifies me to be an apprentice Wizard, you ask? I studied long under Saruman the White as his servant and caregiver to his flocks of crebain. I watched him closely, then stole away one night to pursue my own lofty dreams!

'And now here I am, a Wizard in the making. I shall soon be the great Wizard of Dunland! But first, I need a Ring of Power. 

'I learned much in Isengard about the Great Rings, and I must have one of my own if I am to be respectable in this profession.'
Ore deposits can be found along towering rocks in Pren Gwydh just south of Rook's Hut.\n\nYou should collect ore deposits for the smithing of the ring Rook desires.

'A Great Ring! I can feel the power surging from it. It is a wonder you did not keep it for yourself -- but ah, you are wise. You know that you are too weak-minded to bear such a heavy burden.\n\n'Yes, it is best to leave such things to the great Men, like myself. How did you come by this, [placeholder]? Does it not look marvellous upon my finger?'
There is a small forge at Rook's Hut in Pren Gwydh.\n\nYou should return to the hut with the ore you collected and craft a sufficient ring.
Rook is at his hut in Pren Gwydh, waiting for a Ring of Power to be brought to him.\n\nYou should bring Rook the ring you forged from local metal veins and see if it will suffice for his needs.

'Have you found a Ring of Power? No? You are not searching hard enough. I would like to have one by nightfall, but it is my understanding that they are very difficult to come by. It may take you all day!'
Mine for ore at towering rocks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Forge a ring that will satisfy Rook
Bring the ordinary ring to Rook at his hut
See if TBD likes the ordinary ring
